attributes.action: Charge Prisoners for their stay in prison in a similiar way to University Student Loans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe all convicted prisoners should be charge a fee for keeping them locked up in prison, providing all their daily requirements.

If a prisoner cannot afford to pay their own prison fees they should receive a loan from the government that is paid back in the same way as Univeristy Student Loans.

Prisoners wuld only pay back their loan if they earn over a minimum threshold once released.

The tax payer shouldn't have to pay for the cost of feeding and providing a bed for criminals!
